!Newbie Guide: Are you ready for a new mission? After swapping the Weapon Exchange Ticket you received previously with the Non-Grade Shadow Weapon, go visit %tonpc% and return after receiving quest reward. To find %tonpc%, follow the arrow above your head. I will tell you more later. Can I help you with anything else?
